title: I fixed the League world map

embed.description: Post with 0 views. Shared by Cleam89. Big mistake Riot..

replies.body:
Clearly the most clear political delimitation of the map hasn't been marked correctly either.
There are noxian territories, and soon to be noxian territories. Fix it, Riot.
I wonder what Kled would become with Black Mist in his system?

If you thought him or the black mist were greedy before, i'd hate to see that. I'd give "It" a week to "claim" everything including other people as it's own unless something such as the ascended or targonians got in the way. 

If not it would at least give the void a run for its money on world domination.
